data.text: @grandpa1428 @blakeshelton @NBCTheVoice @kelly_clarkson @gwenstefani Lol, he hates the mullet. He has said in many interviews that he only wore the mullet at that time because it was in style for country music singers. He didn't even like it then lol
@DarylStapleton @blakeshelton @NBCTheVoice @kelly_clarkson @gwenstefani I want to see him go back to sporting the mullet.
